abstracts.cdata!:
The project will support the broadening
            of the Government's economic recovery program, through
            reform of the trade regime and the initiation of
            restructuring and rehabilitation of the industrial sector.
            The cornerstone of the policy package is a major trade
            liberalization program supported by active exchange rate
            management. The liberalization in import restrictions and
            foreign exchange allocation is to be accompanied by progress
            on price decontrol, rationalization of the tariff and sales
            tax structures, reforms in export incentives, and
            liberalization of internal trade. The process of industrial
            restructuring will be the result of the reforms in the
            trade, pricing and foreign exchange regimes and the specific
            subsectoral interventions. The quick disbursing proceeds of
            the credit will contribute to all sectors in the economy, in
            the context of a more liberalized import regime.
